Name: Fairytale Figurine: Hatter
Desc: A humanoid figurine sitting on a chair in deep thought. Can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nIt is said that this model series is based on Devitt. He loves traveling and making toy models, and loves his hats still more â€” even when sitting, he is considering such matters. May he become the hatter he wishes to be as soon as possible.
